staxel.village.dialogue.intro.Eris.line:: Whoa! Nearly ran right over you there!
You must be new around here...
I'm ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;. Skateboards and bugs are my thing!
You're the one who built me my new house, right?
Oh, right, I'm ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;! Probably shoulda introduced myself first.
Anyways, I can't give you much, but here's a little something as a thanks!
